text: Platinum () is a city in Alaska. == Geography == Platinum is located at .GNIS Feature Detail Report for: Platinum It is located on Goodnews Bay adjacent to the mouth of the Small River and eleven miles southwest of Goodnews and the Kilbuck Mountains. == History == Platinum was named in the 1930s due to the platinum ore found in the area. The site was a mining boomtown by 1937 boasting a roadhouse, two trading posts and a population of fifty. A post office had been established in 1935. An earlier Inuit village called Arviq had been abandoned. The town was incorporated as a city in 1975. == References == Category:Cities in Alaska
title: Platinum, Alaska
